desc.en: Elites siphon health when they attack.
Zealots get +1 attack after killing an enemy.
All cards receive 1 damage after an attack.

desc.ne: Kaarten die niet aanvallen verdienen levens punt.
desc.lt: Nepuolanti korta, gauna 1 papildomą gyvybės tašką.
desc.hu: Cards that do not attack gain 1 point of health.
desc.nb: Kort som ikke angriper får ett helsepoeng.
desc.pi: Ships that don't fight drink 1 rum.
desc.it: Le carte che non attaccano guadagnano 1 punto vita.
desc.pl: Karty które nie atakuja zyskuja 1 punkt zycia.

desc.en: Player cards can perform two actions per turn.
Every action has a 50% chance to fail.
desc.ne: Elke actie heeft 50% kans om te valen.
desc.hu: Every action has a 50% chance to fail.
desc.nb: Hver handling har en 50% sjangse for å mislykkes.
desc.pi: All plots be as likely to succeed as heads on a coin.
desc.it: Ogni azione ha una probabilità del 50% di fallire.
desc.pl: Kazda akcja ma 50% szansy na niepowodzenie.

desc.en: No new cards can be played.
desc.ne: Er kan niet met nieuwe kaarten worden gespeeld
desc.lt: Kovos lauke nebegalima padėti naujų kortų.
desc.hu: No new cards can be played.
desc.pi: No new cards can enter the battlefield.
desc.it: Non possono essere giocate nuove carte.
desc.pl: Nie mozna wprowadzic nowych kart na pole gry.

desc.en: All cards gain the move ability.
desc.ne: Alle kaarten krijgen de verplaats kracht.
desc.hu: All cards gain the move ability.
desc.pi: All ships take up thar anchors and can sail about.

desc.en: Cards stay alive until their health reaches -10.
desc.ne: Kaarten blijven levend todat hun levens -10 halen.
desc.lt: Visos kortos išlieka gyvos iki kol jų gyvybių taškai pasiekia -10.
desc.hu: Cards stay alive until their health reaches -10.
desc.nb: Kort forblir i live til helsepoengene deres når -10.
desc.pi: Ships don't sink until they have -10 rum.
desc.it: Le carte possono stare in vita fino a quando la loro salute raggiunge -10.
desc.pl: Karty nie umieraja poki ich punkty zycia osiagaja -10.

desc.en: Cards that would die become zombies instead.
desc.ne: Kaarten die dood zouden gaan, worden zombies.
desc.hu: Cards that would die become zombies instead.
desc.nb: Kort som ville dødd blir til zombier i stedet.
desc.pi: All ships that sink becomes servants of Davy Jones.
desc.pl: Karty ktore umieraja staja sie zombie.

desc.en: All cards lose 1 health per turn.
desc.ne: Alle kaarten verliezen 1 leven elke beurt.
desc.lt: Visos kortos, kiekvieną ėjimą praranda po 1 gyvybės tašką.
desc.hu: All cards loose 1 health per turn.
desc.nb: Alle kort mister 1 helsepoeng i runden.
desc.pi: All ships are on fire and lose 1 rum each turn.
desc.it: Tutte le carte perdono 1 punto vita per turno.
desc.pl: Kazda karta traci co ture 1 punkt zycia
